articles.description: Max Verstappen edged ever closer to the 2022 title with victory over Charles Leclerc at the Italian Grand Prix. No prizes for guessing which category he falls into this week then. But which drivers join him in our winners’ section – and which drivers left Mon…

articles.title: NASCAR's Denny Hamlin Problem Will Eventually Blow up in Its Face - Sportscasting
articles.description: Denny Hamlin has a conflict of interest driving for one Cup Series team while owning a piece of another.
articles.content:
NASCAR has a Denny Hamlin problem thats been hiding in plain sight for two seasons. The sports executives would be wise to fix it now rather than explain it later.

articles.title: Browns have so much work to do. Don’t go easy on defense – Terry Pluto’s Scribbles - cleveland.com
articles.description: The Browns had a 20-7 lead early in the second half – and blew it to Baker Mayfield and the Carolina Panthers.
